Is it candy or something?!\""},{"lineNumber":18345,"originalJapaneseLine":"　要るかそんなもん！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Who needs that kind of thing!\""},{"lineNumber":18346,"originalJapaneseLine":"「わっ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Wah!\""},{"lineNumber":18347,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あっ……！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah...!\""},{"lineNumber":18348,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………ん？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Huh?\""},{"lineNumber":18349,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスが突き飛ばした拍子に、メアリーの手から","translatedEnglishLine":"As Rance pushed her, from Mary's hand"},{"lineNumber":18350,"originalJapaneseLine":"取り出されかけた物が滑り落ちる。","translatedEnglishLine":"the object she was taking out slipped and fell."},{"lineNumber":18351,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あーあ。割れちった」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah man. It's broken.\""},{"lineNumber":18352,"originalJapaneseLine":"「怪我してないですか、メアリーちゃん。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Are you hurt, Mary-chan?"},{"lineNumber":18353,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ごめんなさい、ランス様が……」","translatedEnglishLine":"I'm sorry, Lord Rance...\""},{"lineNumber":18354,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ああ、ヘーキヘーキ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, it's okay, it's okay."},{"lineNumber":18355,"originalJapaneseLine":"　でも乱暴は良くないぞー、総統」","translatedEnglishLine":"But being rough isn't good, Supreme Commander.\""},{"lineNumber":18356,"originalJapaneseLine":"「けっ、どうせなんかくだらんものだろ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmph, it's probably some worthless thing anyway."},{"lineNumber":18357,"originalJapaneseLine":"　それより目障りだ、とっとと失せ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"More importantly, it's annoying, so just get lost...\""},{"lineNumber":18358,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ろぉーーーーーーーー！！！？？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Rooooo---------!??\""},{"lineNumber":18359,"originalJapaneseLine":"その、廊下の隅で砕け散ったものが視界に入り、","translatedEnglishLine":"That shattered object in the corner of the hallway caught his eye,"},{"lineNumber":18360,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスの表情が変わった。","translatedEnglishLine":"and Rance's expression changed."},{"lineNumber":18361,"originalJapaneseLine":"「せーっかく、綺麗な形の奴を見つけたのに」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I went to the trouble of finding a beautifully shaped one,\""},{"lineNumber":18362,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ばっ、ばっ、こ、これ、っ……！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Th-this, th-this...!\""},{"lineNumber":18363,"originalJapaneseLine":"　た、確か、っ……！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"If I remember correctly...!\""},{"lineNumber":18364,"originalJapaneseLine":"「クルックーーーーーーーー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Kurukuuuuuuuu!\""},{"lineNumber":18365,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はい。超オーロラ貝ですね。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yes. That's a Super Aurora Shell."},{"lineNumber":18366,"originalJapaneseLine":"　このサイズは、学会でも発見は稀だったはず」","translatedEnglishLine":"Shells this size are rare even in academic discoveries.\""},{"lineNumber":18367,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……無事だった頃は、ですが」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...That was when it was still intact.\""},{"lineNumber":18368,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ぐおああああぁぁあーーーーーー！！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Guaaaaahhhhhh!!\""},{"lineNumber":18369,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスはあまりの罪深さにその場でのたうち回った。","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance writhed on the spot overwhelmed by his guilt."},{"lineNumber":18370,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あーもう。乱暴にすっから。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah, geez. It's because you were so rough."},{"lineNumber":18371,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ちりとり、ぽいぽい」","translatedEnglishLine":"Dustpan, swoosh swoosh.\""},{"lineNumber":18372,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あっ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ah...\""},{"lineNumber":18373,"originalJapaneseLine":"メアリーは割れてしまった超オーロラ貝を、","translatedEnglishLine":"Mary quickly swept up the broken Super Aurora Shell pieces,"},{"lineNumber":18374,"originalJapaneseLine":"さっさとちりとりで掃き集めてしまった。","translatedEnglishLine":"with a dustpan without delay."},{"lineNumber":18375,"originalJapaneseLine":"「くっ……チビガキ……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ugh... brat..."},{"lineNumber":18376,"originalJapaneseLine":"　まさかお前も貝コレクターか……」","translatedEnglishLine":"I didn't think you were a shell collector too...\""},{"lineNumber":18377,"originalJapaneseLine":"「しかもかなりの手練れと見ました」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"And you seem to be quite skilled at it.\""},{"lineNumber":18378,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いや別に？　綺麗だから時々拾うんだよ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Not really? I just pick them up sometimes because they're pretty."},{"lineNumber":18379,"originalJapaneseLine":"　まあ、誰かにだいたいあげちゃうけど」","translatedEnglishLine":"Though I usually end up giving them to someone else.\""},{"lineNumber":18380,"originalJapaneseLine":"「この貝ももうひとつあったんだけど、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I had one more of these shells,"},{"lineNumber":18381,"originalJapaneseLine":"　今朝、泣いてる子供にあげちまったよ」","translatedEnglishLine":"but I gave it to a crying child this morning.\""},{"lineNumber":18382,"originalJapaneseLine":"「マジか」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Seriously?\""},{"lineNumber":18383,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そ、それはどこのどいつ……！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"W-who was that, exactly...!\""},{"lineNumber":18384,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……………………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........................\""},{"lineNumber":18385,"originalJapaneseLine":"「言うの止めとく。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I'd better not say."},{"lineNumber":18386,"originalJapaneseLine":"　あんた、探して奪い取りそうだし」","translatedEnglishLine":"You'd probably search for it and take it by force.\""},{"lineNumber":18387,"originalJapaneseLine":"「くっ……そんなレアものを、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ugh... giving away something so rare,"},{"lineNumber":18388,"originalJapaneseLine":"　適当にガキに与えるとは……」","translatedEnglishLine":"so casually to a brat...\""},{"lineNumber":18389,"originalJapaneseLine":"「へっ。いい子にしてれば、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Heh. If you're a good kid,"},{"lineNumber":18390,"originalJapaneseLine":"　そのうち総統にもやるよ。なーんてなー」","translatedEnglishLine":"maybe someday the Supreme Commander will get one too. Just kidding.\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: メイドさんらも困ってるんだぞ」
完全に子供をあやすような口ぶりで、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Speaking completely like they were soothing a child,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: メアリーはポケットから何かを取り出そうとした。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Mary tried to take something out of her pocket.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「がーーーー！　飴ちゃんかなんかか！
要るかそんなもん！」
「わっ」
ランスが突き飛ばした拍子に、メアリーの手から
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: As Rance pushed her, from Mary's hand

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 取り出されかけた物が滑り落ちる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the object she was taking out slipped and fell.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あーあ。割れちった」
「怪我してないですか、メアリーちゃん。
ごめんなさい、ランス様が……」
「ああ、ヘーキヘーキ。
でも乱暴は良くないぞー、総統」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But being rough isn't good, Supreme Commander."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「けっ、どうせなんかくだらんものだろ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmph, it's probably some worthless thing anyway.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それより目障りだ、とっとと失せ……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: More importantly, it's annoying, so just get lost..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ろぉーーーーーーーー！！！？？」
その、廊下の隅で砕け散ったものが視界に入り、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That shattered object in the corner of the hallway caught his eye,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスの表情が変わった。
「せーっかく、綺麗な形の奴を見つけたのに」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I went to the trouble of finding a beautifully shaped one,"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ばっ、ばっ、こ、これ、っ……！
た、確か、っ……！」
「クルックーーーーーーーー！」
「はい。超オーロラ貝ですね。
このサイズは、学会でも発見は稀だったはず」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Shells this size are rare even in academic discoveries."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……無事だった頃は、ですが」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...That was when it was still intact."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ぐおああああぁぁあーーーーーー！！」
ランスはあまりの罪深さにその場でのたうち回った。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance writhed on the spot overwhelmed by his guilt.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あーもう。乱暴にすっから。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Ah, geez. It's because you were so rough.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ちりとり、ぽいぽい」
メアリーは割れてしまった超オーロラ貝を、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Mary quickly swept up the broken Super Aurora Shell pieces,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: さっさとちりとりで掃き集めてしまった。
「くっ……チビガキ……
まさかお前も貝コレクターか……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I didn't think you were a shell collector too..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「しかもかなりの手練れと見ました」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "And you seem to be quite skilled at it."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いや別に？　綺麗だから時々拾うんだよ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Not really? I just pick them up sometimes because they're pretty.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まあ、誰かにだいたいあげちゃうけど」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Though I usually end up giving them to someone else."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「この貝ももうひとつあったんだけど、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I had one more of these shells,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今朝、泣いてる子供にあげちまったよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but I gave it to a crying child this morning."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「マジか」
「そ、それはどこのどいつ……！」
「言うの止めとく。
あんた、探して奪い取りそうだし」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You'd probably search for it and take it by force."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「くっ……そんなレアものを、
適当にガキに与えるとは……」
「へっ。いい子にしてれば、
そのうち総統にもやるよ。なーんてなー」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: maybe someday the Supreme Commander will get one too. Just kidding."

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English
